titles: An answer to the severall petitions of late exhibited to the High Court of Parliament and to His Excellency the Lord General Cromwell by the poor husband-men, farmers and tenants in severall counties of England for the taking away of tithes paid to priests and impropriators.
notes: Reproduction of original in the Harvard University Library.
keywords: Great Britain --  History --  Commonwealth and Protectorate, 1649-1660.
